TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientResponseChannelSinkStack

Docs.summary: Provides the stack functionality for a stack of client response channel sinks that must be invoked during an asynchronous message response decoding.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AsyncProcessResponse (System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ITransportHeaders headers, System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AsyncProcessResponse(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ITransportHeaders headers, class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

Docs.param: The headers retrieved from the server response stream.
The stream coming back from the transport sink.
Docs.summary: Requests asynchronous processing of a method call on the sinks in the current sink stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AsyncProcessResponse method initializes asynchronous processing on the top sink in the current sink stack. For additional information, see <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

Docs.exception: The current sink stack is empty.
The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
Docs.permission: for operating with infrastructure code. Demand value: ; Permission value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DispatchException(class System.Exception e) cil managed

Docs.param: The exception to dispatch to the server.
Docs.summary: Dispatches the specified exception on the reply sink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DispatchException method dispatches the specified exception to the server through the reply sink specified in the constructor of the current sink stack. If the current sink stack was created without a reply sink, the exception is not transmitted, and no new exception is thrown.

Docs.exception: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
Docs.permission: for operating with infrastructure code. Demand value: ; Permission value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DispatchReplyMessage(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage msg) cil managed

Docs.summary: Dispatches the specified reply message on the reply sink.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DispatchReplyMessage method dispatches the specified message to the server through the reply sink specified in the constructor of the current sink stack. If the current sink stack was created without a reply sink, the message is not transmitted, and no new exception is thrown.

Docs.exception: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
